name: Natalia V. Shakhlevich
content:
Dr Natasha Shakhlevich | School of Computer Science | University of Leeds Skip to main content University links Search Destination Faculty of Engineering and Physical Sciences site All leeds.ac.uk sites School of Computer Science Search Faculty of Engineering and Physical Sciences School of Computer Science People Profile Dr Natasha Shakhlevich Position: Senior Lecturer Email: N.Shakhlevich@leeds.ac.uk Phone: +44(0)113 343 5444 Location: 9.10o E C Stoner Building Website: My Personal Site Responsibilities Examinations Officer Research interests Natasha's research interests are in the area of Deterministic scheduling theory, combinatorial optimisation, computational complexity. See the Algorithms and Complexity research group page for further information. Research groups and institutes Computing in Biology, Medicine and Health Distributed Systems and Services Institute of Design, Robotics and Manufacturing Algorithms and Complexity

Postgraduate research opportunities

We welcome enquiries from motivated and qualified applicants from all around the world who are interested in PhD study. Our research opportunities allow you to search for projects and scholarships.

Projects
  • Optimisation Algorithms for Distributed Computing
  • Optimisation Algorithms for Problems with Changeable Parameters
